---
always_allow_html: yes
output:
  html_document:
    css: ../../css/ccze.css
params:
  data.directory: 'https://sdw-wsrest.ecb.europa.eu/service/'
  data.collection: >
    !r append(
      rep(list(
        list(
          dimensions=c("FREQ","CURRENCY","CURRENCY_DENOM","EXR_TYPE","EXR_SUFFIX"),
          DATASET="EXR",
          CURRENCY=c("USD","JPY","GBP","CHF","DKK","SEK","CZK","HUF","RON","BGN","PLN"),
          FREQ="A",
          EXR_SUFFIX=c("E","A"))
        ),
      2),
      list(
        list(
          dimensions=c("FREQ","CURRENCY","CURRENCY_DENOM","EXR_TYPE","EXR_SUFFIX"),
          DATASET="EXR",
          CURRENCY=c("USD","JPY","GBP","CHF","DKK","SEK","CZK","HUF","RON","BGN","PLN"),
          FREQ="M",
          EXR_SUFFIX=c("E","A")
        )
      ) 
    )
  data.params: >
    !r list(
      list(startPeriod=1999,endPeriod=1999),
      list(lastNObservations=2),
      list(lastNObservations=6)
    )  
  data.template: !r c("ecb.sdw.ws")
  lang: "FR"
  numpage: 27
---

#get data & metadata:

# t <- rmarkdown::metadata
data.collection <- getDataCollection()

#year 1999 time series:
data.y99.0 <- getData(data.collection,1)
# meta <- data.y99.0[[1]] #metadata
data.y99.0 <- data.y99.0[[2]]

#yearly time series:
data.y.0 <- getData(data.collection,2)
data.y.0 <- data.y.0[[2]]

#monthly time series:
data.m.0 <- getData(data.collection,3)
data.m.0 <- data.m.0[[2]]

# browser()

#generate selector for the time series:
x <- params$data.collection
series <- eval(parse(text=regmatches(x,regexec("(?<=CURRENCY=).+(?=,)",x,perl=T))[[1]]))
rm(x)
series.tmp <- c()
for (cur in series)
  series.tmp <- append(series.tmp,c(list(list(CURRENCY=cur,EXR_SUFFIX="E")),
                                    list(list(CURRENCY=cur,EXR_SUFFIX="A"))))
series <- series.tmp
rm(series.tmp,cur)

#filter and sort data by currency:

setData <- function(ts) {
  res <- ts[with(ts,order(match(CURRENCY,lapply(series,`[[`,1)),rev(EXR_SUFFIX),date)),]
  res <- matrix(res$OBS_VALUE,ncol=grep("E",ts$EXR_SUFFIX)[1]-1,byrow=T)
  return(res)
}

#set series title

comment <- function() {

data.m.yoy.0 <- tail(getData(data.collection,params$data.collection[2])[[2]][,1:33],6) #monthly change
data.m.mc.0 <- tail(getData(data.collection,params$data.collection[2])[[2]][,c(1,34:65)],6) #year-on-year change

data.y <- t(tail(data.y.0[,series],3))

#set metadata:

#generate datatable:

col.m.yoy <- zoo::as.yearmon(as.character(data.m.yoy[1,]),"%Y-%m")

      th(colspan=1,rowspan=3),

         style=style.sep)
    ),
    tr(
      lapply(as.character(data.y[1,]), th, rowspan=2),
      getTH(base::table(as.character(format(col.m.mc,"%Y"))),"Y",sep.style),
      getTH(base::table(as.character(format(col.m.yoy,"%Y"))),"Y",sep.style)

      getTH(as.character(format(col.m.yoy,"%b")),"M",sep.style)
    )
  )
))

#data

t1 <- genDataTable(data,met[-1],sketch,
                   countries.highlight=c("USD","JPY","GBP","CHF"),
                   sep.col=c(3,5),sep.style=sep.style)

#ouput the table
t1
